thread.section_title: ProofreadingPal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProofreadingPal.com | proofreadingpal.com
thread.title: Rod Hilsabeck

author: Rod Hilsabeck
title: Rod Hilsabeck
text: As a writer, sometimes you spend so much time with your project that you develop blinders. It was tremendously beneficial to have another set of eyes on my punctuation, grammar and even to receive suggestions about sentence structure, etc.. The professionals caught things I had missed, even after I had reviewed my manuscript many times. And even if your project is already solid, it's a great way to get confirmation.
